channel.title: K8s on T-Mobile Open Source
channel.description: Recent content in K8s on T-Mobile Open Source

item.title: Deploying VMWare Harbor on Azure Kubernetes Service aka AKS
item.description: VMware Harbor is an open source all in one enterprise-class container registry that extends open source docker distribution and adds many functionalities that are typically required in the enterprise such as: container registry container image vulnerability scanning notary (Content trust and digital signing) We recently went through an evaluation process of VMware Harbor and had to deploy it on our Azure Kubernetes cluster.
